javascript:!function(){var n=document.createElement("div"),t={hour:"2-digit",minute:"2-digit"};n.setAttribute("style","\n    position: absolute;\n    top: 0px;\n    left: 0px;\n    z-index: 2147483647;\n    color: green;\n    background: black;\n    font-family: Arial, Verdana;\n    font-size: 14pt;\n\n"),document.body.appendChild(n),setInterval(function(){n.textContent="ðŸ•’ "+Intl.DateTimeFormat("en-GB",t).format(new Date)},1e3)}();
